hash.description: The md5 hash of the file

path.description: The path to list files from.

hashes.description: If true, the hash of each file is returned.

recursive.description: If true, the entire directory tree is returned.

state.description: Shows the current state of the extension.

updated.description: Shows last update time of the config.

visibility.description: Indicates under which circumstances the extension configuration should be visible.

authExtension.description: Shows if extension can be used for user management.

remote.description: Shows if the domain refers to a remote server.

required.description: Shows if the extension is considered to be required.

guid.description: The globally unique identifier associated with the extension.

configVersion.description: The version of the extension's configuration.

packageVersion.description: The version of the NuGet package that contains the extension.

licensed.description: Indicate the extension is license status.

thirdParty.description: Indicate the extension is a customer extension.

debuggerAttached.description: Indicates whether a debugger is or will be attached to the extension.

friendlyName.description: A more readable name version of the extension name.

items.description: List of all users and their permissions.
List of all users and their permissions.

allOf.description: Parameters that are forwarded to the authentication extension's ChangePassword function.

anyOf.description: Changes to the USERGROUPUSERS entry of the current user.

allOf.description: Calling this method without writeValue will read the current settings.

domain.description: Domain name of the authentication extension

userName.description: Name of the user without domain prefix

anyOf.description: Parameters that are forwarded to the authentication extension's AddUser function. Notice that the userName without the domain is forwarded automatically.

settings.description: Changes to the USERGROUPUSERS entry of the user

domain.description: Domain name of the authentication extension

userName.description: Name of the user without domain prefix

AUTOMAP.description: Automatically obtain symbol information such as options and schema from the domain.

CHECKCOMPLEXITY.description: Do not add symbol, check complexity of added symbol instead

readValue.description: The SessionId of the logged in user.

mergeSettings.description: Merge settings from the symbol configuration into the schema.

fileName.description: Name of the file to delete.

checkSum.description: Checksum of the file as MD5 hexadecimal-string.

domain.description: Upload extension dll to remote filesystem.

anyOf.description: User name. The authentication domain can be specified by using 'Domain::UserName'. If no domain is specified all users with the given name will be logged out.

clientCertificate.description: Thumbprint of the used client certificate
